participant_1.background:
I enjoy trying new ethnic foods with my friends from out of town.
I spent my last year learning about art and history so that I can be a better museum curator.
I love to spend time with my cat, especially when I'm feeling stressed from school.
my credit cards are maxed out.
My new job in the medical field is much more fulfilling than my old job as a tour guide.

participant_2.background:
I love working the farm, and I get my exercise that way.
I have a baby mobile in my nursery that plays classical music to help my child sleep.
My flute playing is a form of self-expression and a way to connect with my inner self.
i can say the alphabet backwards.
My spouse is a doctor who works long hours, but I am grateful for their support.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Good! I'm just doing some chores before my spouse gets home from work. How about you?
Pretty good! I just finished a long day at work and I'm relaxing with my cat.
What do you do for work?
I'm a museum curator. I've been working on a new exhibit about art and history.
That sounds really interesting! I love history. Do you get to travel a lot for your job?
Sometimes! I just got back from a trip to Europe where I visited a bunch of museums.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to go to Europe.
You should! It's a beautiful place.
I know, I know! I'll make it happen one day.
I hope so!
Thanks! What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love learning about new things and sharing that knowledge with others.
That's a great reason! I'm sure you're a great curator.
Thank you! I try my best.
What's your least favorite thing about your job?
Sometimes it can be a lot of work, but it's all worth it in the end.
That's understandable. I'm sure it's very rewarding.
It is! I love what I do.
That's great to hear
